teps for intrapartum cardiotocography trace interpretation 
1. Check  the paper speed. It should be 1cm/min. If the paper speed is set at 2 or 3cm/min, adjust it to 1cm/min.
2. After applying the toco probe, ensure that the tocograph is zeroed, and recording.
